sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<j2:set var="jvar_amp" value="&"/>
 <script>
	console.log("kathy was here");
	var resLink = decodeURIComponent("${sysparm_res_uri}").replace("&", "$[jvar_amp]");
	var currentLink =  decodeURIComponent("${sysparm_current_uri}").replace("&", "$[jvar_amp]");
	console.log(resLink);
	console.log(currentLink);
    window.open(resLink);
    window.open(currentLink, "_parent");
 </script>
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: resilient_redirect
